segments.text: What ’ s the first thing you do when you go to the bathroom in the morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I look at myself in the mirror . Sometimes , it ’ s not a pleasant sight , especially if I have been out late the late before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you usually shower or take a bath ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually don ’ t have time for a bath in the mornings , so I just take a shower . Sometimes I need a cold shower to wake me up and sometimes I need a hot one , especially if it ’ s winter and I need to warm up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I shave every workday , but I only shave at weekends if I ’ m going out somewhere . If I ’ m staying at home , I don ’ t shave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you brush your teeth twice a day as dentists recommend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I brush my teeth in the morning , just before I go to work . It ’ s actually the last thing I do before leaving . Then I brush again before bed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your dentist must be proud of you !
segments.speaker: S1
